BaseTexture Class

Uses
  • EventTarget
Defined in: src/pixi/textures/BaseTexture.js:11
Module: PIXI

A texture stores the information that represents an image. All textures have a base texture

Constructor

BaseTexture

(
  • source
  • scaleMode
)

Defined in src/pixi/textures/BaseTexture.js:11

Parameters:

  • source String

    the source object (image or canvas)

  • scaleMode Number

    Should be one of the PIXI.scaleMode consts

(
  • type
  • listener
)

Inherited from EventTarget: src/pixi/utils/EventTarget.js:32

Adds a listener for a specific event

Parameters:

  • type String

    A string representing the event type to listen for.

  • listener Function

    The callback function that will be fired when the event occurs

fromCanvas

(
  • canvas
  • scaleMode
)
static

Defined in src/pixi/textures/BaseTexture.js:197

Helper function that returns a base texture based on a canvas element If the image is not in the base texture cache it will be created and loaded

Parameters:

  • canvas Canvas

    The canvas element source of the texture

  • scaleMode Number

    Should be one of the PIXI.scaleMode consts

Returns:

BaseTexture

fromImage

(
  • imageUrl
  • crossorigin
  • scaleMode
)
static

Defined in src/pixi/textures/BaseTexture.js:162

Helper function that returns a base texture based on an image url If the image is not in the base texture cache it will be created and loaded

Parameters:

  • imageUrl String

    The image url of the texture

  • crossorigin Boolean
  • scaleMode Number

    Should be one of the PIXI.scaleMode consts

Returns:

BaseTexture

(
  • type
)

Inherited from EventTarget: src/pixi/utils/EventTarget.js:101

Removes all the listeners that were active for the specified event type

Parameters:

  • type String

    A string representing the event type which will have all its listeners removed

(
  • type
  • listener
)

Removes the specified listener that was assigned to the specified event type

Parameters:

  • type String

    A string representing the event type which will have its listener removed

  • listener Function

    The callback function that was be fired when the event occured

Properties

hasLoaded

Boolean

Defined in src/pixi/textures/BaseTexture.js:50

[read-only] Describes if the base texture has loaded or not

height

Number

Defined in src/pixi/textures/BaseTexture.js:33

[read-only] The height of the base texture set when the image has loaded

scaleMode

PIXI.scaleModes

Defined in src/pixi/textures/BaseTexture.js:42

The scale mode to apply when scaling this texture

Default: PIXI.scaleModes.LINEAR

source

Image

Defined in src/pixi/textures/BaseTexture.js:59

The source that is loaded to create the texture

width

Number

Defined in src/pixi/textures/BaseTexture.js:24

[read-only] The width of the base texture set when the image has loaded

Boolean

Defined in src/pixi/textures/BaseTexture.js:70

Controls if RGB channels should be premultiplied by Alpha (WebGL only)

Default: TRUE

Object

Inherited from EventTarget: src/pixi/utils/EventTarget.js:24
